name: Star Defender (itch) (Yee)
description:
Star Defender - Summary

A fast-paced action tower defense game.
Instead of gathering resources, the player needs to keep swapping turrets based on energy generators that are spread around the level.


Tools: Unity, Magicka Voxel, Audacity, Visual Studio


Development Time: Roughly 2 weeks.


Sound effects: nsstudios, MusicLegends, MATRIXXX, primeval_polipad Game Design - Detail Soon Code

Implemented a system that allows the Game Designer to create game sequences from scratch with relative ease using Scriptable Objects.


Pathfinding system that allows enemies to spawn in different positions and take different routes.
Enemy waves can change their attack target if the one they were originally targetting is destroyed.


Rail system that allows turrets to search for a generator and use it to power themselves up.
